game_description: Drunkn Bar Fight is a simple, immersive, silly, rowdy game. Get into fights and use anything and everything around you to create as much chaos as you like. Why limit yourself to bars? Crash a wedding, get into back alley fights, riot a store or even a police station! Enjoy performing socially unacceptable behavior without the resulting obligatory visits to the hospital, jail and courts. The only limits to the mayhem is your imagination and your moral decency. ‚Ä¢ Now with 4 Player Co-Op! ‚Ä¢ 6 levels: bars, parties, a supermarket, a police station and the streets ‚Ä¢ More than 110 different weapons, from crowbars to nunchakus, beer bottles, tip jars, plungers, explosives and more! ‚Ä¢ Brawl with over 50 enemies including a Karen, an Incel and Open Carry Grandfather who's lost his Granddaughter and sidearm at Black Friday
Languages: English, English (US), English (Australia), English (Canada), English (UK), English (South Africa)
review_1: All of the bad reviews are ppl who have never seen this game and just bought it, I watched videos on it, and it's amazing, really fun, yes the low quality Ali's are annoying, but it's literally called" drunken bar fight", YOUR SUPPOSED TO BE FCKING DRUNK! And if your wondering if you should get this for your kid, just get it for them unless you REALLY don't want your kid to see alcohol and fighting, but that's dumb since it takes off a lot of stress off my body, and with school being sexist, this game is perfect
review_2: first off, i really love this game, its a nice stress relief and really good! so i put my sister on this game and she loved it a little too much, she was screaming and beating up everyone! just goes to show the effect this game had on people and how much stress it can pull out of people

review_5: Folks you have no idea how much this game means to me... first off I'm not condolimg violence when I say this.. so when I say when I was in school my buddies and I always beat up on the school bullies and I loved it so much I started getting into fights which leads to trouble ofcourse ...well cause of this game which it lets me take my stress and anger out i just pretend they r bullies and horrible people and it keeps me outta trouble and feels so freaking real hahah oh its a good workout too lol we soo need more games like this.
